summary: this is my katarina nord presets line. i try to get it as close as possible to my katarina ningheim presets line without the custom ningheim race dependency. this mod may be more convenient for all who prefer vanilla races presets
descriptionHtml:
this is my katarina nord presets line. i try to get it as close as possible to my katarina ningheim presets line without the custom ningheim race dependency. this mod may be more convenient for all who prefer vanilla race presets.

this mod will grow. the first preset starts with katarina nord dark eye.
2nd preset is the katarina nord league of legends edition (don't take this title too serious. i've never payed this game)
you just need racemenu, eyes of beauty and ks hairdos renewal mod as prerequisite
for the lol version you need the northborn scars mod for the face scar

you need following mods
skse64
racemenu
eyes of beauty
ks haidos renewal
northborn scars for katarina lol

[b]be aware to use standerd head mesh. ece head mesh is not tested! if you use non standard head meshes the preset will not appear as intended![/b]

[u]installation of the preset:[/u]
- unpack and put the preset file in the folder data\skse\plugins\chargen\presets (if you use mo it also can be the
overwrite folder depending on your installation settings).
- open console ingame an type showracemenu
- select nord race female if not already set
- chose "preset" button in the menu and then the preset load button and load the desired preset.
- you may change and optimize the preset now. don't forget to save it in a new preset and to save the game.

my recommendations for skin,teeth and eyes are the same as for katarina ningheim presets.

my cute fingers option in my [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/82568/?]cute fingers seamless body mod[/url] is strictly recommended for a full detailed unp based character (just don't use it on low end rigs) and for all of my female presets!
you may use it also for high res unp npc and followers.

you may watch[b]Â  [/b][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/search/?gsearch=xrayy&gsearchtype=authors&tab=mods][b]my other skyrim mods here[/b][/url].

[b]i absolutely recommend the [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/93219?tab=posts]doppelganger follower mod[/url] if you like to try my presets with a beautiful twin follower.[/b]

expect the same quality as for the ningheim presets. i hope you like this katarina preset option.
thank you for trying it - and for taking your time for comments and endorsments!
author: xrayy
